TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but it only becomes well known to turtles.

I wish that I had the best thing ever.

Granted ,and that was you nation in bloc being attack by every single nation in the game of Bloc.

I wish that the United States of Kerbin to be free of communism.

Granted, but there is a massive economic collapse and the space program gets shut down for good.

I wish, that i could type faster

Granted ,but improves by 10 milli-seconds

I wish for a muffin.

Granted, but it is shaped like a trollface that spits acid at you.

I wish that I came up with my own original game, Halve Lyef, with my own original character, a theoretical sci-fientest named Gorden Freechman, as the protagonist.

Granted, but you get stalked by the G-string man.

I wish for life-sized Kerbal plushies.

Edited June 15, 2013 by Felsmak

Granted ,but it burns up due to high flamablity

I wish for a muffin.

Granted, but YOU are the muffin. DUN DUN DUNNNNNNNNNNNNNN!

I wish for some prophetical alphabet soup.

Granted, but it's Cassandra brand and no one believes it

I wish I had a water buffalo.

Granted you have a buffalo made of water hope it below freezing.

I wish for a muffin.

Nope.

I wish for the cake from Portal.

Granted ,but are you sure you want to eat it it contains cement.

I wish for a muffin for mlp.

Granted, but it is rejected by them. Why did you think that the Mice who Like Pudding conglomerate would accept a muffin?

I wish that I could see into the future.

Granted, that is a horrible fate.

I wish for someone to tell me what Bloc is.

Granted, Ich mag KÃƒÂ¤se, und Sie wurden paradoxed, becaused Sie nie gesagt ENGLISH!

I wish that its Not butter.

Edited June 16, 2013 by Bobhendly

Granted. You will get a horrible surprise the next time you eat a sandwich.

I wish I had a pet dragon.

Granted, but the Dragon Bit the arm that fed it, and you Died.

I wish that It IS REAL BUTTAR! (Paradox!)

Granted, you have real butter in a fake tub.

I wish that in 10 years time, robots would be everywhere. In the house, in the street and in the workplace.

Granted, but none of them work and they just litter the place so that nobody can move. Also, they're all robot vacuum cleaners.

I wish I had the ability to fly at will.

Granted, but it's at the will of a cranky 3 year old. Have fun~

I wish for there to be no rain for two weeks

Granted. At the end of the two weeks, all the rain that WOULD have fallen in that time falls on your head at the same time.

I wish I was AWSSOMEANZNNSMIMANABIXJH!!!!!!!!!!

Granted, but it's its own corruption.

I wish for blue skies with fluffy white clouds

Granted. The clouds look white and fluffy, but they are actually REALLY EVIL...

I wish Trekkette was stuck in my basement together with a *slightly* mad chipmunk...

granted the chipmunk suffered an implosion killing you but somehow not trekkette

i wish that i didn't just miss everything while i was on holiday.

Granted, now everything that you missed comes back at you at around 100 mph.

I wish that I sneaked into Area 51.
